name: When the Darkness comes
description: When the Darkness comes is a walking simulator whose glitchy and dark tale tries to illustrate the hardships of depression and anxiety through a variety of imaginary digital landscapes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-3xxx Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 and up, or similar. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1060 and up, or similar. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 550 MB available space
